News.headline: Match Preview: Southport FC v Dagenham and Redbridge
News.page_title: Match Preview: Southport FC v Dagenham and Redbridge
News.URL_keywords: Match Preview: Southport FC v Dagenham and Redbridge
News.short_description: A preview of the Daggers Vanarama National League away match against Southport FC on Saturday
News.description:
The Daggers currently sit 2nd in the Vanarama National League following their last minute winner in a 3-2 win last week at home to Chester.

Andy Preece takes charge of his first league game as Southport manager following his appointment during the week. The Sandgrounders currently sit one place and one point above the relegation zone.

Previous Five Results

Daggers
Daggers 3-2 Chester
Tranmere 0-2 Daggers
North Ferriby 0-4 Daggers
Daggers 3-0 Braintree
Braintree 3-2 Daggers

Southport
Gateshead 3-0 Southport
Bromley 3-1 Southport
Southport 2-4 North Ferriby
Southport 1-2 Wealdstone (FA Trophy)
Barrow 0-1 Southport

Team News
Jake Howells and Sam Ling could feature in the squad following their appearances in the latest Daggers friendly at home to Southend on Tuesday. Williams and Robinson are still expected to miss out.

Previous Meetings
The two teams have met 22 times altogether since 1993 with the Daggers winning eight times and losing six. The last time these two teams met was on the first day of this Vanarama National League season with goals from Okenabirhie, Guttridge and Maguire-Drew sealing a 3-0 home win for the Daggers

Fixtures
There is a full fixture list taking place in the Vanarama National League on Saturday. 3pm KO unless stated

Chester V Gateshead (12:15 KO)
Aldershot V Barrow
Braintree v North Ferriby
Dover V Wrexham
Forest Green V Boreham Wood
Guiseley V Eastleigh
Lincoln v Woking
Solihull V Sutton
Southport V Dag & Red
Torquay V Macclesfield
Tranmere V Bromley
York V Maidstone
